* A friendlybot.task.Deadline task is a simple task with a description and a deadline.
* Constructs a new friendlybot.task.Deadline task with the specified description and deadline.
* @param description The description of the friendlybot.task.Deadline task.
* @param by The deadline of the friendlybot.task.Deadline task.
* Returns a string representation of the friendlybot.task.Deadline task.
* @return A string in the format "[D][statusIcon] description (by: date)".
* An friendlybot.task.Event task is a task with a description and a start and end timing.
* Constructs a new friendlybot.task.Event task with the specified description and timings.
* @param description The description of the friendlybot.task.Event task.
* @param from The start time of the friendlybot.task.Event task.
* @param to The end time of the friendlybot.task.Event task.
public Event(String description, LocalDate from, LocalDate to) {

* Constructs a new friendlybot.task.Task with the specified description.
* @param description The description of the task.
* Returns the status icon of the task.
* @return "X" if the task is done, otherwise a space character.
* Marks the task as not done.
* Returns a string representation of the task.
* @return A string in the format "[statusIcon] description".

* Returns a string representation of the friendlybot.task.ToDo task.
